description.value:
Your power from the moon and stars becomes strong enough to illuminate the night sky. You gain your choice of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Asterism] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Touch of the Moon] domain spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.

Special You can take this feat a second time, gaining the focus spell that you didn't gain the first time. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.
